content: कूलं {@--1@} A shore, bank; राधामाधवयोर्जयंति यमुनाकूले रहःकेलयः <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; नदीवोभवकूलभाक् <ls>R. 12. 35</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">68.</ls> {@--2@} A slope, declivity. {@--3@} Skirt, edge, border, proximity; कुलायकूलेषु विलुव्य तेषु ते <ls>N. 1. 141.</ls> {@--4@} A pond. {@--5@} The rear of an army. {@--6@} A heap, mound.
